description.name: Renewable next 30 days metrics
description.description: Summary of total expected and actual power output for selected generators

en.name: Renewable next 30 days metrics
en.description: Summary of total expected and actual power output for selected generators

devConfigurations.name: queries[0].fields
values: query selectedAssetDetail($tenantId: String!, $assetId: String) { selectedAssetDetail: businessObjects(simpleFilter: { type: Asset, tenantId: $tenantId }, hint: { viewId: "graph" }, advancedFilter: { AND: [ {EQUALS: [{SELECT: "id", type: STRING}, {VALUE: $assetId, type: STRING}]} ]} ) { totalCount pageInfo { hasNextPage endCursor } edges { cursor object { ...on Asset { id assetType assetIdentifier location { selectedLocationId:locationIdentifier } }  } } }  }

devConfigurations.name: queries[1].fields
values: query assetDetailsFromLocationIdentifier($tenantId: String!, $selectedLocationId: String) { assetDetailsFromLocationIdentifier: businessObjects(simpleFilter: { type: Asset, tenantId: $tenantId }, hint: { viewId: "graph" }, advancedFilter: { AND: [ {EQUALS: [{SELECT: "location.locationIdentifier", type: STRING}, {VALUE: $selectedLocationId, type: STRING}]}, {EQUALS: [{SELECT: "assetType", type: STRING}, {VALUE: "PLANT", type: STRING}]} ]} ) { totalCount pageInfo { hasNextPage endCursor } edges { cursor object { ...on Asset { selectedAssetId: id assetIdentifier }  } } }  }

devConfigurations.name: queries[2].fields
values: query next30Days($tenantId: String!, $selectedAssetId: String) { avgWindForecastNext30Days: businessObjects(simpleFilter: { type: AssetTimeSeries, tenantId: $tenantId }, hint: { viewId: "graph" }, advancedFilter: { AND: [ {EQUALS: [{SELECT: "asset.id", type: STRING}, {VALUE: $selectedAssetId, type: STRING}]}, { GREATER_EQUALS: [ { SELECT: "startDate", type: STRING }, { VALUE: "2021-04-01", type: STRING } ] }, { LESS_THAN: [ { SELECT: "startDate", type: STRING }, { VALUE: "2021-05-01", type: STRING} ]}, { EQUALS: [ { SELECT: "seriesType" }, { VALUE: "FORECAST" } ] }, { EQUALS: [ { SELECT: "duration" }, { VALUE: "24" } ]}] }, aggregationParams: { reduce: { expression: { fieldPath: "metric1", operator: AVG, type: FLOAT }, output: { resultAlias: "avgWindForecastNext30Days", type: FLOAT } } } ) { totalCount aggregationResults { dimensionValues { name value } values { name numValue } } } energyForecastV2Next30Days: businessObjects(simpleFilter: { type: AssetTimeSeries, tenantId: $tenantId }, hint: { viewId: "graph" }, advancedFilter: { AND: [ {EQUALS: [{SELECT: "asset.id", type: STRING}, {VALUE: $selectedAssetId, type: STRING}]}, { GREATER_EQUALS: [ { SELECT: "startDate", type: STRING }, { VALUE: "2021-04-01", type: STRING } ] }, { LESS_THAN: [ { SELECT: "startDate", type: STRING }, { VALUE: "2021-05-01", type: STRING} ]}, { EQUALS: [ { SELECT: "seriesType" }, { VALUE: "FORECAST" } ] }, { EQUALS: [ { SELECT: "duration" }, { VALUE: "24" }]}] }, aggregationParams: { reduce: { expression: { fieldPath: "metric1", operator: SUM, type: FLOAT }, output: { resultAlias: "energyForecastV2Next30Days", type: FLOAT } } } ) { totalCount aggregationResults { dimensionValues { name value } values { name numValue } } } }
